tags: None
review: I consulted him for persistent cough. Before visiting here I have consulted many doctors around but my cough was not getting cure. But when I visited Dr. Jinendra Jain, he able to know what was the problem with me. He actually have done few tests to know that I have allergic cough and he prescribed me accurate medicines. He smile or no I have no idea ... but yes he is good person with good communication skills... majorly we visit doctors for the particular reason and he actually does his duty well. Very good experience. My cough is gone now with his medicines. Thank you doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had gone for treatment of child. However, he very politely said a paediatrician would be the right doctor for such treatments. I have visited another doctor once when the doctor just referred to other specialist and for that also the doctor charged 500 rupees. But even when I asked for consultation charge, he politely said not needed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I met him during my admit in Bhaktivedanta Hospital where he is a visiting consultant. He was able to diagnose my illnesses and also kept me on good medication which helped me heal very soon. After I was discharged when I told few people that Dr Jinendra treated me I was surprised that many people know him and have a good feedback for him. This is because they were treated by him in the past. This shows a lot about reputation of Dr Jinendra.

tags: Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: there is something not right with this doctor. I visited him for my mother's skin disease .  my mother can't explain well (she was bit nervous so could not tell her exact problem) so I interpreted and stared explaing her problem to doctor, but this doctor won't let me speak a bit, his behaviour was extremely rude. his prescription was not explained well and satisfactory . people wants to know it out there .
reply_text:
Mr Arun,
You came to me for a skin problem in spite of knowing that I am not a dermatologist. Your mother was very much undestanding but you were not allowing her to talk. She is not a minor.  You came with lot of  invetigations without any advise and those were not required. In spite of all this your investigations were looked by me.Sugars were borderline so it was told you to get repeated and I referred your mother to to a dermatologist. Better you understand the things.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor is too busy in his mobile chat..not given good attention to me as a patient. Doc is not friendly(esp his tone & no smile) while sayin what kinda medication i should take. When I showed him previous reports (done 3months before), he said what is the use of this now. The purpose to show him previous report is to understand my past medical history. ********* ** ** ***** ** ****** *** ********* ** ******* ***** *** ****** *** ********* **** ******** ** **** *****

tags: None
review: Been visitng him since 2 years for both me and my wife. ******* ********* ** ******* ****** *** ********** ********** He dosent prescribe unwanted tests or medicines. Would surely recommend everyone.

tags: None
review: ************ *** ***** wanted to show for thyroid problem ,he listens to our problems, first he checks the history of the report then he suggested us the medication,he did gave time for consultation and explained thoroughly, we are satisfied with the doctor, Overall its was a good experience
